column1: Smoque BBQ////I went to Smoque on a work lunch trip with a vendor and was amazed at how packed the place was. It was kind of ridiculous. Good thing we had reserved a table! The line was very long and the wait was somewhat agonizing
column2: since the aroma of brisket and pulled pork wafted everywhere and I was starving! Finally
column3: we were served our food. We were cramped at the table
column4: literally rubbing shoulders with each other
column5: but that didn't matter so much to me
column6: the food was excellent. I ordered the pulled pork sandwich and it was very good. Came with fries and cole slaw.
